schema.description: 证书内容。该证书必须是通过[CreateCdnCertificateSigningRequest](~~144478~~)接口创建的CSR对应的签名证书，内部必须是PEM格式的证书，Base64编码后再通过encodeURIComponent。
要设置的加速域名，需属于HTTPS加速类型。

400.errorMessage: You must specify the Certificate parameter.
An error occurred while encoding the certificate.
An error occurred while decoding the certificate.
The format of the certificate is invalid.
The certificate does not match the domain.
The private key of the certificate does not exist.

500.errorMessage: You cannot modify the configurations when some features of the domain are in a canary deployment.
An error occurred while configuring the certificate.

title: 设置CSR证书
summary: 调用SetCdnDomainCSRCertificate设置指定域名下的HTTPS证书。
